import React, { PureComponent } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; class Productcreate extends PureComponent { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { name:' ', sku:' ', unit:' ', hsn:' ', quantity:' ', price:' ', description:' ' } } namechangeHandler = (e) => { this.setState({name:e.target.value}) } skuchangeHandler = (e) => { this.setState({sku:e.target.value}) } hsnchangeHandler = (e) => { this.setState({hsn:e.target.value}) } unitchangeHandler = (e) => { this.setState({unit:e.target.value}) } quantitychangeHandler = (e) => { this.setState({quantity:e.target.value}) } pricechangeHandler = (e) => { this.setState({price:e.target.value}) } descriptionchangeHandler = (e) => { this.setState({description:e.target.value}) } submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(JSON.stringify(this.state)); /* axios.post('https://farzi-erp.herokuapp.com/inventory/product/?format=api' , this.state) .then( res => { console.log(res); })*/ } render() { const {name,sku,unit,hsn,quantity,price,description}=this.state; return (

New Product

) } } export default Productcreate
